title: ISic000681. I.Sicily inscription 000681
body:
Facsimile Images

a
Sex(to) Nonio
Sex(ti) f(ilio) Quir(ina)
Africano
[---]ṆP̣P̣ vixsit a(nnis) XXIIX
b
Caeciliae Zoticae
Sex(tus) Nonius Albanus
o[pt]imaẹ uxori fecit
e[pul]um sing(ulis?) (sestertium) n(ummum) dignum eius

Apparatus criticus

Text: Manganaro 1989

English translation

To Sextus Nonius Africanus, son of Sextus, of tribe Quirina [...] lived for 28 years. To Caecilia Zotica, Sextus Nonius Albanus made this for his excellent wife. One sestertius per person [was provided] for a banquet worthy of her.

commentary

bibliography

  • 1989.0338h https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001283
  • Manganaro 1989 163-164 no.12 fig.12 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001831
  • Fasolo 2013 82-83 no.28 fig.54 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002011
Licensed under a Creative Commons-Attribution 4.0 licence.
